passwordDialog.title: Change Password
passwordDialog.description: To change your password, please enter your current password and your new password.
passwordDialog.requestDescription: Click the button below to send a password reset link to your registered email address.
passwordDialog.errorUpdateFailed: Failed to update password. Please try again.
passwordDialog.errorPasswordStrength: New password does not meet complexity requirements (min 8 chars, upper, lower, number, symbol).

settings.exportDataDescription: Download all your application data (expenses, income, accounts, etc.) as a single JSON backup file.
settings.exportSuccess: Data export successful! Check your downloads.
settings.exportFailed: Data export failed. Please try again.
settings.importWarningDescription: Importing data will DELETE ALL existing data in the application and replace it with the data from the selected JSON file. This action cannot be undone.
settings.importDataDescription: Upload a previously exported JSON backup file (.json) to restore your data.
settings.importInvalidFile: Invalid file type. Please select a .json file.
settings.importSuccess: Data import successful! Reloading may be required.
settings.importFailed: Data import failed. Please check the file format or try again.
settings.importConfirmConsequence: This will permanently delete all current data and replace it with the contents of the selected file.
settings.licencePlaceholderNote: Note: Licence validation is currently a placeholder.
settings.licenceNoteV2: Note: Entering a key updates status but does not unlock features in this version.

sidebar.logoutMessage: Are you sure you want to log out of your account?

customReport.title: Custom Report Generator
customReport.description: Select data types, date range, and format for your custom export.
customReport.columnSelectionNote: Column selection coming soon. All default columns will be included.
customReport.errorNoDataTypes: Please select at least one data type.
customReport.errorLicenceRequired: Active licence required for this feature.
customReport.errorNoDataFound: No data found for the selected criteria.

budgetManager.fillRequired: Please fill in Category, Amount Limit, Period, and Start Date.
budgetManager.deleteConfirmText: Are you sure you want to delete the budget for '{{name}}'? This action cannot be undone.
budgetManager.confirmBulkDeleteBudgets: Are you sure you want to delete the selected {{count}} budget rule(s)? This action cannot be undone.
budgetManager.bulkDeleteError: Failed to delete selected budget rules.

goalManager.fillRequired: Please fill in Goal Name and Target Amount.
goalManager.targetAmountPositive: Target Amount must be greater than zero.
goalManager.currentAmountHelper: How much you've saved so far.
goalManager.currentAmountExceedsTarget: Current amount cannot exceed target amount.
goalManager.deleteConfirmText: Are you sure you want to delete the goal '{{name}}'? This action cannot be undone.
goalManager.confirmBulkDeleteGoals: Are you sure you want to delete the selected {{count}} goal(s)? This action cannot be undone.

recurringManager.title: Manage Recurring Transactions
recurringManager.fillRequired: Please fill in Name, Amount, Category, Frequency, and Start Date.
recurringManager.name: Name (e.g., Rent, Netflix)
recurringManager.deleteConfirmText: Are you sure you want to delete the recurring item '{{name}}'? This action cannot be undone.
recurringManager.confirmBulkDeleteRecurring: Are you sure you want to delete the selected {{count}} recurring item(s)? This action cannot be undone.
recurringManager.bulkDeleteError: Failed to delete selected recurring items.

incomeManager.title: Manage Income
incomeManager.fillRequired: Please fill in Amount, Date, and Source.
incomeManager.deleteConfirmText: Are you sure you want to delete the income record from '{{source}}' for ${{amount}}? This action cannot be undone.
incomeManager.confirmBulkDeleteIncome: Are you sure you want to delete the selected {{count}} income record(s)? This action cannot be undone.
incomeManager.bulkDeleteError: Failed to delete selected income records.

accountManager.title: Manage Accounts
accountManager.fillRequired: Please fill in Name, Type, Starting Balance, and Balance Date.
accountManager.deleteConfirmText: Are you sure you want to delete the account '{{name}}'? This action cannot be undone.
accountManager.confirmBulkDeleteAccounts: Are you sure you want to delete the selected {{count}} account(s)? This action cannot be undone and may affect linked transactions if not handled properly.
accountManager.bulkDeleteError: Failed to delete selected accounts. Ensure they are not linked to transactions.

expenseImport.description: Upload a CSV file to bulk import your expenses. Ensure the file has the correct columns and format.

expenseImport.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please select a .csv file.

incomeImport.description: Upload a CSV file to bulk import your income records. Ensure the file has the correct columns and format.

incomeImport.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please select a .csv file.
incomeImport.apiError: An error occurred during upload. Please check the file or try again.

signup.title: Sign Up
signup.createAccountPrompt: Create your account to get started
signup.errorUsernameExists: Username already exists. Please choose another.
signup.errorEmailExists: Email already registered. Try logging in.
signup.errorSignupFailedInput: Signup failed. Please check your input.
signup.errorSignupFailedGeneral: Signup failed due to a server issue. Please try again.
signup.errorServerNotResponding: Server not responding. Please try again later.
signup.errorUnknown: An unexpected error occurred during signup.
signup.successMessageDefault: Your account has been created successfully. You can now log in.
signup.validationWarning: Please correct the errors highlighted below.
signup.validationUsernameSpecialChars: Username cannot contain special characters or spaces.
signup.validationUsernameAlphaNumeric: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores (_).
signup.validationEmailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.
signup.validationContactNumberDigits: Contact number must be exactly 8 digits.
signup.validationPasswordStrength: Password must be at least 8 characters long and include uppercase, lowercase, number, and special symbol.

login.title: Login
login.signInPrompt: Sign in to access your account
login.errorLoginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
login.errorServerNotResponding: Unable to connect to the server. Please try again later.
login.errorUnknown: An unexpected error occurred during login.
login.devNoteBackendRunning: Note: Make sure Python backend is running before logging in!
login.devNoteNewUserCredentials: Additional Note: Newly registered user credentials appear here for development.

resetPassword.title: Reset Your Password
resetPassword.validationPasswordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
resetPassword.successMessage: Password reset successfully! Redirecting to login...
resetPassword.errorMessage: Failed to reset password. The link might be invalid or expired.
